mapper.select: SELECT c.cartNo AS cartNo, c.muId AS muId, g.gdsNo AS gdsNo, m.muName AS muName, g.gdsName AS gdsName, g.gdsImg1, g.gdsAmount, c.cartAmount, g.gdsPrice AS gdsPrice, (gdsPrice*cartAmount) money FROM Mu_Goods g, Cart c, Mu_Member m WHERE m.muId = c.muId AND g.gdsNo = c.gdsNo AND c.muId = #{muId} ORDER BY c.cartNo
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET cartAmount = #{cartAmount} WHERE muId = #{muId} AND gdsNo = #{gdsNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CART WHERE muId = #{muId} AND gdsNo = #{gdsNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET cartAmount = cartAmount + #{cartAmount} WHERE muId = #{muId} AND gdsNo = #{gdsNo}
